item.description:
We'll take the Glen Boulder Trail, see magnificent above tree line views for more than a mile, hit the 4003' open summit with 360 degree views, and return to our spotted cars. Our group will meet at Rocky Branch before 8:00 am and spot a return car here and drive up to Glen Boulder. There can only be 10 hikers in this group as we are in a wilderness designated area. U.S.F.S. rules. This round trip traverse up Glen Boulder Trail to Mount Isolation (4003') and out Rocky Branch is 13.3 miles, an elevation gain of 3,800' in a book time of 9 hours that will likely take 10 hours. All, as usual, are welcome to join in the fun, share good fellowship & the awesome views!!


SINCE SPACE IS LIMITED, PLEASE KEEP YOUR RSVP UP TO DATE. WE'RE LOOKING FORWARD TO A GREAT HIKE!


Saturday hikers!! We will convene at Rocky Branch TH by 8:00 am Saturday. We will leave one or two cars here and then begin the hike at Glen Boulder Trailhead, which is north on RT 16.

BRING TREKKING POLES AND Gaitors and extra socks - I've heard its very wet and we will be doing several water crossings...
item.name: Independence Day Weekend-Mount Isolation
